name: Tims Revival
description:
Tim(me xd) lost on planet and has to find way home back! i- need help from you to help me get home. While if you've finished the game there are some easter eggs and there will be some events happening

Demo Details:
Demo will be getting some updates after the final update thats it for demo. The Demo Does not include, Inventory, Level Switching, Menu, Cutscenes and most of the dialogue(Also The Play in browser)

Full Game:
Inventory, Level Switching, Menu, Cutscenes and all dialouge and the full story
